502b726f-7c44-4c0c-a97e-2c77d72e7f44.notes: DR 1; Combustible. If DR is penetrated by burning damage, it can catch fire. See Making Things Burn (p. B433); treat the armor material as resistant; Holdout: -1.

1af1f073-280f-4907-8ebd-6492f246742e.notes: DR 1; Flexible, susceptible to blunt trauma; Holdout: -1.

1dd1ccf9-1079-4771-95d7-d95f6a6a1334.notes: DR 2; Flexible, susceptible to blunt trauma; Holdout: -1.

56688edc-1a7b-4aa5-843b-c5783aac5caf.notes: DR 2; Flexible, susceptible to blunt trauma; -1 DR vs. impaling; Holdout: -1.

008c8e7f-1d5a-4cd7-b8f1-387bb1d82bc1.notes: DR 2; Combustible. If DR is penetrated by burning damage, it can catch fire. See Making Things Burn (p. B433); treat the armor material as resistant; Holdout: -2.

09d76b7d-a50e-48ba-b1e0-0089732b6ab5.notes: DR 3; Semi-ablative. Loses 1 DR per 10 points of basic damage it resists (see p. B47); Holdout: -3.

aa7bde0f-4fc5-4884-aa96-4c498b01ef0b.notes: DR 2; Flexible, susceptible to blunt trauma; Holdout: -1.

6bb6a4af-a895-467b-923d-e2dc47cc643d.notes: DR 3; Flexible, susceptible to blunt trauma; -2 DR vs. crushing; Holdout: -1.

11a436d9-efb5-405a-a89c-5eacb92d5c60.notes: DR 4; Flexible, susceptible to blunt trauma; -2 DR vs. crushing; Holdout: -2.

1906ac9a-f9ef-4b0a-95fd-02364f0d08fb.notes: DR 5; Flexible, susceptible to blunt trauma; -2 DR vs. crushing; Holdout: -2.

cdca4932-13d9-434c-9bff-92e7b7da37ab.notes: DR 6; -1 DX, except for Lance skill; Holdout: -6.

a804b74f-a8f0-447d-aa13-ae57175eba08.notes: DR 6; Combustible. If DR is penetrated by burning damage, it can catch fire. See Making Things Burn (p. B433); treat the armor material as resistant; Holdout: -6.
